price: (ئۇلارغا) «ئېيتىپ بېقىڭلارچۇ؟ (سۈيىڭلار يەر ئاستىغا) سىڭىپ كەتسە، سىلەرگە كىم ئېقىن سۇ كەلتۈرۈپ بېرىدۇ» دېگىن[30].
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
